text: <@U13GPDA1F> while you're JIRA-ing, could you put that email from this morning in?
there's also the thing from this weekend about the PCH unfuckup/fuckup on the chip programming
yeah lets talk about that - not sure what action is needed?
we'll just need to get a build into dogfood today probably
to make sure no one has issues
<@U026PHQ3J> <@U2670DYLE> pulling up info i have for trends push notifications / communicated with client.

*Wanted to follow up with you regarding some of the conversations we've had regarding push notifications for Trends. 
Big picture is - we feel we can implement a first round of this for the November launch given our current understanding of work/priorities* :slightly_smiling_face: 

*A few assumptions *
- Will live with Artworks (<http://gweb-uncorked-workshop.appspot.com/>)
- Pushes will be manual, nothing automated (automated = nice to have, or future update) 
- 2 step process to display info to user (receive push, request locale or selected country from server). Potential for network errors (but we can work around)
- Locale-specific scheduling still TBD (considering nice-to-have for November, but will reassess once we've dived deeper)
- Push history not saved to app (a la Editions) as post content less suited for (can discuss further if this is a goal)

*Need to define*
- What content fields need to accommodate (assuming title, linked image, body copy)
- How to handle locale-specific scheduling 

*Next steps (Uncorked)*
- Implement the ability to associate each registered wallpaper with ID based on case (prior to minime public release) - in progress
can you provide any additional info needed to move forward outside (content fields+ how to handle locale-specific scheduling)?

post meeting update: trends push notifications will not be included in mid-nov launch. we should still work towards this, but considering a Q1 release for minime push notifications <@U2670DYLE> <@U1S5GKTHQ>
